A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The star wars franchise is getting really boring. How many times would we rehash same plots and subplots. Rebel bases on white planets attacked by walkers. two sword bearing gentlemen squaring off in a throne room. Rebel fleet escaping a cordon. Smugglers and thieves being found in a casino or a bar. A reluctant teacher and pupil. Not a single new thing emerges from this movie worth remembering.
